entries.content: Starting to document CSS refactoring work. Reviewing recent changes to theme.css and understanding the ultra-modular architecture pattern we've been implementing across UI components.

CSS Refactoring: Created new metallic-themed checkboxes component (checkboxes.css, 69 lines) with glassmorphism effects, hover states, and custom checkmark styling. Added to theme.css import orchestrator. Follows our ultra-modular architecture pattern with single-responsibility design.

Created comprehensive delta memory for metallic-checkbox-component-extraction task. Documented the 69-line component extraction, integration with theme.css orchestrator, glassmorphism styling patterns, and alignment with our ultra-modular CSS architecture philosophy.
